1120440.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rappan Athuk – Pregenerated Characters (PFRPG)
1120440.description:
Rappan Athuk - Pregenerated Characters

This product has 12 Pre-generated characters fully statted and kitted out as level 1 characters just beginning their adventuring careers, and again as far more experienced adventurers at 6th level. Use them in any Pathfinder campaign or take them into the depths of Rappan Athuk...
If you dare.
You also get 12 portraits and tokens for use with these PCs
Written by:
Bill Webb, Clark Peterson, WDB Kenower, Gabor Lux, Greg Ragland, Matt Finch, Greg Vaughan, John B. Webb, and Skeeter Green
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
